name: TriO 9 DeathMatch for DooM II
description: TriO 9... Bring your friends along to Camp TriO - the ultimate DeathMatch retreat! In this scenic alpine setting, you'll experience terror and exhilaration previously unknown! Features: * Support for DM v1/2, with 2-4 players! * 25 new SFX, including ALL weapons * New music for ALL levels * New graphic resources * Three BRILLIANT levels
